??    ??     Artist: Tyr                                    ??    ??

      ?       ?                                                  ?   ?     ?
            ??                                                    ?? ?
            ?  This is typically Tyr: the whole album is very      ?
            ?  grounded and instrumentally edgy, at the same time  ?
            ?  rhythmically powerful and majestically pumping.     ?
            ?  This is exactly the way, the Faroese Viking         ?
            ?  Metal-heroes return with their fourth album,        ?
            ?  simply entitled "Land", featuring a collection of   ?
            ?  Icelandic and Norwegian traditionals. Old folk      ?
            ?  tunes that were edgily and powerfully arranged for  ?
            ?  this very positively sounding album. And with       ?
            ?  them, the historically interested quartet present   ?
            ?  themselves not too far away from the loveliest      ?
            ?  Humppa-songs that we have come to know. Vocally,    ?
            ?  they have done quite some work, here, making        ?
            ?  "Land" the most mature album to date ÃƒÂ» and that     ?
            ?  also refers to the many dual vocal lines. If you    ?
            ?  know the last records of Tyr well the first thing   ?
            ?  that will be striking for you is the great          ?
            ?  production of the new album. The legendary Jacob    ?
            ?  Hansen has really done a good job here.             ?
            ?                                                      ?
            ?  Tracks 5-10 contain voice-overs.                    ?
            ?                                                      ?
            ? <a href=" http://www.tyr.net/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.tyr.net/</a>                                 ?
